participant_1.background:
I go fishing with my uncle and reminisce about the old days.
i have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes.
i am a senior citizen.
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
I'm not very active on social media, but I like sharing pictures of my walks with my friends and family.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat pizza with my family because it is a fun and easy meal to share.
I'm white, but I have a love for fighting that runs deep in my soul.
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I'm going to a home show to look for ideas for my dream larp room.
I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.

content.text: Pretty good, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm a senior citizen, and I like to go fishing with my uncle.
That sounds nice! I like to eat pizza with my family, because it's a fun and easy meal to share.
I love pizza! I have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes, so I can't go to the mountains to fish.
I'm white, but I have a love for fighting that runs deep in my soul.
I'm not very active on social media, but I like sharing pictures of my walks with my friends and family.
I'm a loner and my family are my only friends. I'm going to a home show to look for ideas for my dream larp room.
That sounds really interesting! I've never heard of larp before.
It's live action role playing. I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.
Oh, I see! That sounds like a fun hobby. I'm sure she would love it if you shared it with her!
Thanks! I'll have to work up the courage to tell her.
Good luck! I'm sure she'll be happy to hear it
